attributes.title: DestructoMatic Rex
attributes.description: Community member "Lopez_55" shows us how to get the DestructoMatic Rex Achievement in Dash of Destruction.

attributes.title: Geoff Wins
attributes.description: Interview with Geoff as he wins his bet against Burnie by getting 10,000 achievement points in one week.

attributes.title: Zombie Genocidest
attributes.description: Community member "Mojopin" shows us his unique way to get the Zombie Genocidest Achievement in L4D. Door boobs FTW.

attributes.title: Community Video: The Artiste, The Photojournalist, Free Fall, Costume Party, Group Photo
attributes.description: Community member "Dizzavy" shows us how to get five Achievements in Dead Rising: The Artiste, The Photojournalist, Free Fall, Costume Party, and Group Photo.

attributes.title: HL2 Keep off the Sand, OSHA Violation, Targeted Advertising
attributes.description: Kite_Shugo shows us how to get these achievements in Half Life 2 on the Xbox 360.

attributes.title: Gears of War 2: A Parting Gift
attributes.description: Community member "Darksied93" shows us how to get teh "A Parting Gift" Achievement in Gears of War 2

attributes.title: Scholar
attributes.description: A guide to the Scholar achiviment in mass effect.

attributes.title: Prince of Persia: Sword Master
attributes.description: Kibs shows us how to get the Sword Master Achievement in Prince of Persia.

attributes.title: Geoff's avatar
attributes.description: Gavin and Griffon help Geoff remake his avatar to look more like him.

attributes.title: Skate 2 - Graphically Extreme
attributes.description: Jack shows us how to get the "Graphically Extreme" achievement in Skate 2.

attributes.title: Skate 2 - Sandbag
attributes.description: Jack throws his body off a dam to get the "Sandbag" achievement in Skate 2.

attributes.title: Skate 2 - Playing Nice Together
attributes.description: Jack gets the online achievement "Playing Nice Together" in Skate 2.

attributes.title: Skate 2 - Need for Speed & Juggling Chainsaws
attributes.description: Jack gets two speed-based achievements in Skate 2.

attributes.title: Skate 2 - On Top of the World
attributes.description: Jack gets the Skate 2 achievement "On Top of the World." It is really high up there.

attributes.title: Skate 2 - The Architect & Dethroned
attributes.description: Jack picks up the two Create-a-Spot achievements "The Architect" and "Dethroned"

attributes.title: Crackdown: Chain Banger
attributes.description: Adam shows us how to get the "Chain Banger" Achievement in Crackdown.

attributes.title: Left 4 Dead - Untouchables
attributes.description: ...figure it out. Gameplay submitted by damnclem, troy0891, 13Church, and Mollypops. Techinque perfected and video edited by Mojopin.

attributes.title: Prince of Persia: Improviser, Sinking to new Depths!
attributes.description: NewfieKeir gets 2 achievements in Prince of Persia

attributes.title: LOTR: Conquest - You have my Bow/Axe
attributes.description: BrownMan shows you how to get "You Have My Bow" and "You Have My Axe" in LOTR: Conquest.

attributes.title: Banjo Kazooie Nuts and Bolts: Arcade Pwner
attributes.description: Awesome gaming action.

attributes.title: Gears of War 2: Party Like it's 1999
attributes.description: Lopez_55 shows us how to get the "Party Like it's 1999" Achievement in Gears of War 2.

attributes.title: Lost Planet: STARDUST
attributes.description: Milesprower's last in a series of 5 videos for Lost Planet. This one covers the target mark locations in Mission 11.

attributes.title: Killer in Pink - Music Video
attributes.description: Here's a music video for the awesome Pajamachievement theme song "Killer in Pink", which was created by the amazingly talented (and hot) Martha Marin and Nico. Thanks to Finchlynch for cutting this together.

attributes.title: Mercs 2- Balls to the Wall
attributes.description: Community member "Blazeofmerc" shows us how to get Balls to the Wall, Eat the Heat, and Gone Shootin'.

attributes.title: Whoa Nelly! Speedy of the Colossus & Minimalist
attributes.description: Three achievements from Banjo Kazooie Nuts and Bolts

attributes.title: On The Clock
attributes.description: Kibs shows us how to get the "On the Clock" Achievement in Mirror's Edge.

attributes.title: Cupcake
attributes.description: A guide to beating two Advanced levels in Portal so as to get the "Cupcake" acheivment.

attributes.title: Endangered Species Part 7
attributes.description: Knuckles shows us where to kill another batch of the pigeons in Alderney. (Part Seven of Eight)

attributes.title: Endless Fun & Hidden Skull
attributes.description: Geoff shows us how to get the Endless Fun Achievement, as well as the hidden skull on Level 2. Also, Burnie is annoying.

attributes.title: Rhino Hugger & 6th Hidden Skull
attributes.description: Geoff shows us how to get the Rhino Hugger Achievement, as well as the sixth hidden skull in Halo Wars.

attributes.title: Micro Manager & 7th Hidden Skull
attributes.description: Geoff fights through his impending obesity to show us how to get the Micro Manager Achievement, as well as the seventh hidden skull in Halo Wars.

attributes.title: Endangered Species Part 8
attributes.description: Knuckles shows us where to kill another batch of the pigeons (29-56) in Alderney. (Part Eight of Eight)

attributes.title: Ramblin Man and 8th Hidden Skull
attributes.description: Geoff shows is how to get both the Ramblin Man Achievement, and the eighth hidden skull in Halo Wars.

attributes.title: Banjo and Kazooie N&B: BBQ Beef and Caught on Camera
attributes.description: See title. It's all you need.

attributes.title: Community Video:SSF2THDR Combomania
attributes.description: Xzeno will teach you the easiest way to get a 7-Hit Chain combo

attributes.title: Banjo Kazooie N&B: Head for Heights
attributes.description: A nice view and some extras...

attributes.title: Banjo Kazooie N&B: Start to Free the Showdown Six &Vigilante
attributes.description: Roundin' up the hooligans.

attributes.title: Bird on the Ground
attributes.description: Kaisonic shows us the "Bird on the Ground" achievement in Call of Duty 4.

attributes.title: Silver-Tongued Devil
attributes.description: Glitched 50 speech challenges

attributes.title: Left 4 Dead - Witch Hunter. Pyrotechnician, Hunter Punter.
attributes.description: 3 achievements for a total of 50'Gs

attributes.title: The Works
attributes.description: Kibs shows that it doesn't take all that much work.

attributes.title: A Cut Above
attributes.description: Girls don't need pajamas to get Gamerscore.

attributes.title: Zombie Chopper
attributes.description: Fight your way through Ravenholm with only the gravity gun to grab 3 achievements.

attributes.title: SSFIITHDR Sagats Scar
attributes.description: Video explaining how to get the "Sagat's Scar" achievement in Super Street Fighter 2 Turbo HD Remix

attributes.title: Four for Twenty
attributes.description: Walkthrough for the following Achievements:Bank JobFortified VenueTorch the JointPulling the Strings

attributes.title: Three for Fifteen
attributes.description: Walkthrough for the following Achievements:MobFaceGetting MadeLet Me Upgrade You

attributes.title: Three for Thirty Five
attributes.description: Walkthrough for:Gun SmugglerLockpickerIt's Not Personal

attributes.title: Crime Rings
attributes.description: Walkthrough showing the following achievements from Godfather II: First Crime Ring Three Crime Rings Five Crime Rings Organized Crime

attributes.title: Superstar Part 1
attributes.description: Kibs is going to be walking you through getting a Time Trial rating of 90.

attributes.title: Badge of Honor: Part 1
attributes.description: Part one of a 5-part video guide, montage style, sorry, mic broke.

attributes.title: Badge of Honor:Part 2
attributes.description: Pretty dishonorable if you ask me

attributes.title: Badge of Honor Part 3
attributes.description: Poor planning on my part cause this video to be short, hooray.

attributes.title: Badge of Honor Part 4
attributes.description: Part 4/5 of the awesome videos by Kibs.

attributes.title: Badge of Honor + Bonus: Fireworks
attributes.description: Final Part of Badge of Honor, plus a bonus achievement, fireworks!

attributes.title: Executions Walkthrough
attributes.description: In this video Gus shows you all the different executions available to you in the game. There is an achievement associated with this (Enforcer) but I don't show the achievement unlocking.

attributes.title: Doctor of the Peggle Arts
attributes.description: Knuckles shows off the final stage of Peggle to nab this rare Achievement

attributes.title: SuperStar: Part Twosies
attributes.description: Kibs shows us how to get 12 more stars in MIrror's Egde on the new DLC maps

attributes.title: Ruined Citadel Runner - Prince of Persia
attributes.description: Gingerlink with a run-and-jumpthrough of the first of the runner achievements in Prince of Persia

attributes.title: Sonic 2: Fast Emerald and Chemical
attributes.description: Community Video covering the two time based Achievements in Sonic 2.

attributes.title: Cod:WaW Raygun
attributes.description: How to find the Raygun in the Campaign stage of Little Resistance

attributes.title: Chaos Master - Part 3 of 3
attributes.description: Last part of 3, showing how to get the Chaos Master Achievement in Sonic 2, as well as Super Sonic and Extended Super immediate afterward.

attributes.title: Devil's Brigade Part Two
attributes.description: Geoff shows us where to get the 22 Dog Tags hidden in Chapter Two of Wolverine. (Part 2)

attributes.title: Devil's Brigade Part Four
attributes.description: Geoff shows us where to get the final Dog Tags hidden in Chapters Four and Five of Wolverine. (Part 4 of 4)

attributes.title: Prototype: Opening Cinematic
attributes.description: Take a look at the very cool opening cinematic for Prototype.

attributes.title: "Killer In Pink" music video, 2.0
attributes.description: A new "Killer In Pink" video cut by finchlynch! Written by Martha Marin, performed by Trocadero.

attributes.title: Ghostbusters: level 2
attributes.description: Geoff shows you how to get all of the hidden artifacts, water fountains and scans for: Back off Man. I'm a Scientist, Ghostbusters Drinking Game, and Spores, Molds, and Fungus on level two: Times Square. As a bonus, he also shows us how to get I Love You When You Rough-House!

attributes.title: You Never Studied
attributes.description: Geoff shows how to get the "You Never Studied" Achievement in level four of Ghostbusters: The Game, for the Xbox 360.

attributes.title: I've quit better jobs than this
attributes.description: Geoff shows how to get the "I've Quit Better Jobs Than This" Achievement in Level Five of Ghostbusters.

attributes.title: Alien Archivist Part One
attributes.description: Community members "Kite Shugo" and "Critical" show us where to find the first 13 of 25 Archives in Mothership Zeta.

attributes.title: Omaha Steaks, Delicious!, Get Over Yourselves, Lay Off the Caffeine
attributes.description: Geoff shows us how to get the following three Achievements in Splosion Man: Omaha Steaks, Delicious!, Get Over Yourselves, Lay Off the Caffeine. As a bonus, Gav makes him look and sound stupid.

attributes.title: Shadow Complex - Walkin' on Water
attributes.description: Jack shows us how to get the achievement "Walkin on Water" in Shadow Complex.

attributes.title: Necromantic DLC Pack
attributes.description: Geoff and Jack and Burnie show off the new Castle Crashers DLC Pack "Necromantic".

attributes.title: TrialsHD: Strike!
attributes.description: Jack picks up the Strike! achievement in TrialsHD.

attributes.title: TrialsHD: Market Meltdown
attributes.description: Jack hits the stock market and picks up the Market Meltdown achievement in TrialsHD.

attributes.title: TrialsHD: Unyielding
attributes.description: Jack can't stop, won't stop in this video for the Unyielding achievement in TrialsHD

attributes.title: Trials HD: Unyielding
attributes.description: Knuckles gives another look at how to unlock the Unyielding Achievement in Trials HD

attributes.title: TrialsHD: Full Throttle
attributes.description: Jack grabs live by the horns and picks up the Full Throttle achievement in TrialsHD.

attributes.title: Monitor Tan, Gold Digger Part Two
attributes.description: Geoff shows how to get the Conservationist Achievement, as well as where the hidden gold and intel is on "Dig Site". (Part Two)

attributes.title: DLThreevements
attributes.description: Adam continues making bad puns and grabbing new DLC achievements in Star Wars: The Force Unleashed, covering the Skywalker Style, Hot Bot, and Jawa Juicer achievements for 15 G each.

attributes.title: Graphic Violence
attributes.description: Gus shows you how to get the Graphic Violence achievement in Wet.

attributes.title: Monkeys 21-30
attributes.description: Gus shows you where monkeys 21-30 are in Wet

attributes.title: Monkeys 31-45
attributes.description: Gus shows you where the final monkeys are in Wet (31-45)

attributes.title: Crash Course: Sight Seeing
attributes.description: Geoff takes a little tour of Crash Course, and shows off some of the less visible elements of the game.

attributes.title: Crash Course: Sight Seeing Part 2
attributes.description: So in our last video, Geoff forgot a few things, which was pointed out to him over and over. Here's hoping this one fills in the gaps.

attributes.title: Wraith Firefight Glitch
attributes.description: Geoff and Gavin show how to get into a Wraith in Firefight.

attributes.title: Coolest Thing Ever
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff show you how to jump the mighty Hextadon, to nab the "Coolest Thing Ever" Achievement in the upcoming game, Brutal Legend.

attributes.title: Silence, Ground Walker!
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff show you how to get the "Silence, Ground Walker" Achievement, as well as some cool gameplay footage from the upcoming EA game, Brutal Legend.

attributes.title: Violence Begets Violence
attributes.description: A walkthrough to show you how to easily defeat pighead in Saw.

attributes.title: Never Truly Free and Cost of the Truth
attributes.description: Gus shows you how to watch both endings of the Saw game without having to replay much of the game!

attributes.title: Quill Tosser
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff reminisce about the good old days, while getting the Quill Tosser Achievement in Brutal Legend.

attributes.title: Mount Rockmore
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff work together in harmony to show you how to chance the faces on Mount Rockmore. No achievement, but lots of love. And hugs.

attributes.title: Metal Queen Fight
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff step in to the lair of the Metal Queen and will hopefully show you how to come out alive. Or at least come out with a fancy new flesh wound.

attributes.title: Overkill
attributes.description: Geoff and Jack and Brian Posehn show you which animals you have to slaughter to pick up the Overkill achievement in Brutal Legend.

attributes.title: Beast Master
attributes.description: Geoffrey and Jack talk about movies from the early 80s and also pick up an achievement where you mount things in Brutal Legend. Mount.

attributes.title: Metal God
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff show you how to finish off your Brutal Legend game and hit 100%. They also talk about a horny map.

attributes.title: Sight Seeing
attributes.description: Geoff and Jack take a casual stroll around Brutal Legend, looking at all of the fantastic lookables.

attributes.title: Good for Your Eyes!
attributes.description: Jack picks up a secret achievement in Fairytale Fights while Geoff swoons over a cute bear.

attributes.title: Basket Case
attributes.description: Jack beats the crap out of more bunnies while Geoff weeps in Fairytale Fights. Join us for secret achievement gathering and floppy-eared death.

attributes.title: 12 Days of Pandora, You're on a Boat, Speedy McSpeederson
attributes.description: Wildrile shows how to get 12 Days of Pandora, You're on a Boat, and Speedy McSpeederson in Borderlands.

attributes.title: A Star is Born, Window Shopping
attributes.description: Jack creates life from which there was none and earns a couple of achievements in the process.

attributes.title: Shooting Boots, Still Practicing
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff grab the practice-mode achievements "Shooting Boots" and "Still Practicing" in Fifa 10. Neither of the two have touched a soccer ball. Or any balls.

attributes.title: Photographer, Camera Man
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff go for the paparazzi-styled achievements in Fifa 10, "Camera Man" and "Photographer." Up next "Digging Through Trash" and "Bribe a Former Lover."

attributes.title: Enemy Intel - Act 1
attributes.description: Jack holds you hand as we take a happy journey to find all of the enemy intel in Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 2!

attributes.title: Pit Boss
attributes.description: Geoff gives some tips for getting the Pit Boss Achievement Guide in Modern Warfare 2.

attributes.title: Colonel Sanderson
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff go chicken huntin' and pick up the Colonel Sanderson achievement in Modern Warfare 2. Many chickens were hurt in the making of this video.

attributes.title: Enemy Intel - Act 2, Part 2
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff show you how to get those pesky enemy intel items in the second half of the second act in Modern Warfare 2. Covered here are levels The Only Easy Day...Was Yesterday, The Gulag and Of Their Own Accord.

attributes.title: Enemy Intel - Act 3, Part 1
attributes.description: Jack and special guest Joel show you the locations of the enemy intel in the first half of Act 3 of Modern Warfare 2. Levels searched include Contingency, Whisky Hotel and Loose Ends!

attributes.title: Enemy Intel - Act 3, Part 2
attributes.description: Finally, we wrap up our intel hunting with the second half of Act 3. Find the final bits of intel in The Enemy of My Enemy, Just Like Old Times and Endgame. Then you can relax.

attributes.title: Dragon Age Origins: Dragonslayer
attributes.description: Gus shows you an easy strategy to get the Dragonslayer achievement

attributes.title: Spec Ops - Alpha - The Pit
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff show you how to get three gold stars in the Spec Ops Alpha mission The Pit.

attributes.title: Spec Ops - Alpha - Sniper Fi
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff show you how to get three stars in the Alpha "Sniper Fi" level in Spec Ops.

attributes.title: Spec Ops - Alpha - O Cristo Redentor
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff show you how to get three stars in the Alpha "O Cristo Redentor" level in Spec Ops.

attributes.title: High Dive
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff jump off a really tall building for Gamerscore in Assassin's Creed 2.

attributes.title: Red Light Addict
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff show you how to get the Red Light Addict Achievement in Assassin's Creed 2.

attributes.title: Perfect Harmony
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff are like two peas in a pod picking up the "Perfect Harmony" achievement in Assassin's Creed 2. Achievement guides never sounded so good.

attributes.title: Man of the People
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff make it rain all over Venice to pick up the "Man of the People" achievement in Assassin's Creed 2. Dolla dolla bills y'all.

attributes.title: Fly Swatter
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff show you how to get the Fly Swatter Achievement in Assassin's Creed 2.

attributes.title: Brutal Legend Multiplayer Contest!!
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff make a rare in-front-of-camera appearance to give a few details about a Brutal Legend contest that you can take part in!

attributes.title: Tainted Coil Units
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff run through the Tainted Coil units in Brutal Legend multiplayer. Learn more about the evilness that is the Tainted Coil, and Geoff talks about his taint.

attributes.title: Ironheade Units
attributes.description: Geoff and Jack tackle the "good" guys in Brutal Legend, the Ironheade units. They walk through all of the different folks that Eddie Riggs controls and learn a bit about life on the road.

attributes.title: Drowning Doom Units
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff slap on some eyeliner and walk through the Drowning Doom units in Brutal Legend. They then talk about Tim Burton and the genius that was Nightmare Before Christmas.

attributes.title: Doctor
attributes.description: Jack and Burnie talk about playing doctor together while picking up achievements in Assassin's Creed 2.

attributes.title: Messer Sandman
attributes.description: Jack and Burnie talk about all things sand in this awesome video that also includes Assassin's Creed 2.

attributes.title: Street Cleaner
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff pick up some trash in Venice to pick up the Street Cleaner achievement in Assassin's Creed 2. Enjoy the magical bales of hay.

attributes.title: Show Your Colors
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff walk around throwin' colors all over Italy to pick up the Show Your Colors achievement in Assassin's Creed 2. Aight.

attributes.title: Octopus Egg
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff show you the location of the hidden octopus in Assassin's Creed 2. If you act nicely you might get to pet him!

attributes.title: Sweeper
attributes.description: Geoff and Jack whip around their large pole to pick up the Sweeper achievement in Assassin's Creed 2.

attributes.title: Spec Ops - Alpha - Evasion
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff put on the snow gear and do a bit of evading in this Spec Ops mission from Modern Warfare 2.

attributes.title: Spec Ops - Alpha - Suspension
attributes.description: Geoff and Jack relive the 1989 World Series by crawling on a bridge while it collapses around them. Where is Mark McGuire when you need him

attributes.title: Spec Ops - Bravo - Overwatch
attributes.description: Geoff shoots ants from the sky while Jack cowers in a farm house in this spec ops mission from Modern Warfare 2.

attributes.title: Hidden Room in Dark Carnival
attributes.description: Geoff and Andrew show you how to access a hidden room in Dark Carnival, similar to the Jesus Room in the original Left 4 Dead.

attributes.title: White Dots Map Help
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff show you a painless way to find all of the hidden items in the world of Saboteur.

attributes.title: Pigeon Parfait
attributes.description: Geoff and Jack go pigeon huntin' to pick up the Pigeon Parfait achievement in Saboteur.

attributes.title: Chain Smoker
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff show you how to get black lung and the Chain Smoker achievement in Saboteur.

attributes.title: Club Dead, Chain of Command
attributes.description: Geoff explains the requirements for getting the Club Dead Achievement, and throws in Chain of Command for the hell of it.

attributes.title: Spec Ops - Bravo - Bomb Squad
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff drop some knowledge and defuse some bombs in the Spec Ops level, Bomb Squad in Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 2.

attributes.title: Spec Ops - Charlie - Breach & Clear
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff stumble their way through the Breach and Clear stage of Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 2 Spec Ops. You will probably do better than them.

attributes.title: Spec Ops - Bravo - Race
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff hit the slopes for some funtime adventures on snowmobiles! Enjoy this video from the Bravo Spec Op "Race" in Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 2.

attributes.title: Spec Ops - Charlie - Time Trial
attributes.description: Geoff and Jack hit the slopes again and put the pedal to the metal in Time Trial, a Charlie Spec Op in Modern Warfare 2. Spoiler alert: Jack wins.

attributes.title: Army of Two: The 40th Day Preview
attributes.description: Jack flies around the world to talk with some of the folks behind EA's upcoming Army of Two: The 40th Day. Starting in Seattle and ending in Montreal, Jack talks with some producers and gets some hands on time. Awesome!

attributes.title: Look Ma, I Can Fly!
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff learn to fly and pick up the "Look Ma, I can fly!" achievement in TrialsHD.

attributes.title: No Deal
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff (with cameos by Gus and Burnie) pick up the "No Deal" achievement in TrialsHD. Howie Mandel would be proud.

attributes.title: Piggyback
attributes.description: Geoff and Jack relive a simpler time while picking up the "Piggyback" achievement in TrialsHD. Oh youth.

attributes.title: Spec Ops - Bravo - Body Count
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff head for a Taco Taco in the "Body Count" Spec Op in Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 2. Geoff goes for the nachos while Jack downs a burrito.
